page.title: 05FARMING
page.content: The area includes parts, or the whole, of 16 farms, mostly owner occupied. Overall these range from 1600 to 30 acres. Current acreage is 865 barley, 645 wheat, 13 oats, 4 linseed, 33 peas, 474 grassland, 85 woodlands and 23 buildings, tracks etc. 18 people work on the land and service 582 cattle, 20 sheep, 4300 pigs and 20 geese using 31 tractors and 192 other implements. Half own a grain dryer and 2/3rds a combine. 1/3 hold 5 tied cottages. Mains water is available in most areas but one relies on rain water and others on boreholes. The average value is Â£1600/acre producing 2.5tons winter, 2.0 spring barley & 2.75 wheat. Nearly all farmers have no other income. They support CAP with some changes, and are sympathetic to public concern for the environment and the use of dangerous chemicals
